news.title: Mary Keitany Earns 4th New York Marathon Title, 3 Minutes Ahead of Pack
news.description: Four of the top seven finishers in the women’s race were American, including last year’s winner — Shalane Flanagan — in third place.

news.title: For Maryland Football, a Lackluster Defeat Caps a Brutal Week
news.description: In a 24-3 loss to Michigan State, the Terrapins looked very much like a team suffering under the weight of a week of devastating turmoil.

news.title: Lelisa Desisa Wins the New York City Marathon in the Last Miles
news.description: The 28-year-old Ethiopian overtook the defending champion, Geoffrey Kamworor of Kenya, after a miles-long dogfight through the 26.2-mile course.

news.title: A Year After Her Breakthrough, Shalane Flanagan Runs On
news.description: Flanagan drew wide admiration last year when she became the first American since the 1970s to win New York. She was supposed to retire. She didn’t.
